series.name: The Sentinel Series
series.description: Follow the complete journey of The Sentinel Series - an epic trilogy exploring duty, sacrifice, and loyalty.

books.title: Sentinel's Dilemma
books.description: The first book in The Sentinel Series is now available! Join the journey as our protagonist faces impossible choices between duty and conscience.

books.title: Sentinel's Crisis
books.description: The epic conclusion to The Sentinel Series will test everything our characters hold dear.
